snippet.title: Scenes from the Heart - Official Trailer HD
snippet.description:
"Scenes from the Heart—Part 1" is my very first Visual Novel game, which I started working on since Dec 2023 and will be released on Steam this year. The content of this trailer is a little extra story for the true fans. ^^

Game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3364520/Scenes_from_the_Heart__Part_1/

In this heartwarming Visual Novel, you will aid two of your new classmates while also getting to know them better.  Explore the world of improv theater, tease the group's Tsundere, discover their backstory, and work together to create your own Visual Novel.
